name: ChicagoTrainTimes
0:
”Alexa ask Chicago Train Times when is the next Red line train at Clark and Division”
”Alexa ask Chicago Train Times if there are any delays on the Red line”
”Alexa ask Chicago Train Times to make my home stop Damen on the Blue line”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chicago train times
des:
Arrival times and delays for train on Chicago's L System. Ask Alexa for the next train at a specific stop and line to get the next arrival, store a home location, or get delay info per line.

Added home stop capability. Store your home stop with Alexa and ask when is my next train at home. 

Developed with data from the CTA.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
